version_info:
0.145
+World 8: maximumhome (with music)
+new areas available
+new move icetomato
+new item icetomato
*fixed cant use flypads
+jump & fall while aiming
-removed wating on animation on aiming and more (much better FPS handling)
0.143
Reorganized the game, this means you have to re unlock the worlds and gates again, takes only 2 minutes.
This must be done to move the cave/tunnels to it's own world and to not cause confusion.
+World 7: BabbelDesert (no music yet)
+3 new areas in the Cave tunnels
+mainmanu music
+move: Spring (available in World 7)
+Move: swining (bars) (available in World 9)
+Item: Lifestatue (extra life)
+Item: Spring (jumps)
+Patch support, (downloadable quick fixes for current releases, instead of download the entire game.)
*Fixed more bugs and problems
